content: The vaccine brand extension (https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc-rc1/refs/heads/rc2-ddcc/StructureDefinition-DDCCVaccineBrand.html) is a coding . . . bound to what...?
..and same question for vaccine market authorization? (https://who-int.github.io/svc/refs/heads/rc2/StructureDefinition/DDCCVaccineMarketAuthorization)

Michele Mottini said:

The vaccine brand extension (https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc-rc1/refs/heads/rc2-ddcc/StructureDefinition-DDCCVaccineBrand.html) is a coding . . . bound to what...?

what vaccine brand is representing ? is if it a medicinal product code it might be one of the vaccineCode.coding....

Michele Mottini said:

..and same question for vaccine market authorization? (https://who-int.github.io/svc/refs/heads/rc2/StructureDefinition/DDCCVaccineMarketAuthorization)

Beside the name Immunization.manufacturer seems to cover a wider scope (without distinguishing between MAH, IDMP manufacturer and so on...).

If is enough to provide one manufacturer/MAH I'd suggest to represent the MAH with that element.
If we want to enforce the fact that the manufacturer element is used for conveying a MAH an extension might be used just to say that....
